snippet: Speaking before the European Parliament in Strasbourg, Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany urged other leaders to meet “a test of historic dimensions.”
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel addresses European Parliament, pleading for Europe to unite to overcome migrant crisis, and warning sheer number of refugees will have global impact no matter what; Merkel faces ongoing criticism  for her management of crisis and steadfast stance to keep borders open and accept new arrivals, despite lack of housing, personnel and other services needed to settle unprecedented amount of refugees.

byline.original: By ALISON SMALE and BARBARA SURK
byline.contributor: Alison Smale reported from Berlin, and Barbara Surk from Vienna.

lead_paragraph: Speaking before the European Parliament in Strasbourg, Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany urged other leaders to meet “a test of historic dimensions.”

headline.main: Angela Merkel Calls for United Europe to Address Migrant Crisis
headline.print_headline: Merkel Calls for Europe to Address ‘Test of Historic Dimensions’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
